channel.title: Dosentti's Original Metal Song
channel.description:
here it is. This is a demo played live. Will make a full studio version soon. Tell me what u think
http://www.mediafire.com/download/l43m7a79k9sv7af/Feys.m4a.zip
Tell me if this works VOLUME IS A BIT LOW https://soundcloud.com/dosentti-oden/song

item.title: Dosentti's Original Metal Song
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:6, topic:539218”]guitar tone is rather feminine. riffs aren’t very metal. needs more drum fills. it sounds almost electronic - is this a drum machine?

sounds like progressive metal, although the drumming didn’t really blend with the song well. overall i liked it though

this is not progressive as it shows limited or no progression.

keep in mind i’m being critical because i am a fan.[/quote]

Alright, I can’t find a good guitar distortion…
also thats me playing the drums, I usually do put accents here and there but I liked the plain sound in this song.

Read full topic

item.title: Dosentti's Original Metal Song
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

guitar tone is rather feminine. riffs aren’t very metal. needs more drum fills. it sounds almost electronic - is this a drum machine?

Clawz fury:

sounds like progressive metal, although the drumming didn’t really blend with the song well. overall i liked it though

this is not progressive as it shows limited or no progression.

keep in mind i’m being critical because i am a fan.

Read full topic
